h1_title: The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm
content: When defeated, you'll earn his Fungiman Spirit to add to your collection. Not far past where the Fungiman was hiding you can spot the stairway up to Level 4, but there's a bit more to explore here first.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pagoda_Realm_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'The Beguiling Chant of the Pagoda Realm', specifically from the subsection 'Upper Pagoda (Level 3)'.
The content is as follows:
When defeated, you'll earn his Fungiman Spirit to add to your collection. Not far past where the Fungiman was hiding you can spot the stairway up to Level 4, but there's a bit more to explore here first.
